name: Ninja Bat
description:
After a breakout at the animal testing facility, a bat begins to develop super intelligence after having been injected with an apparent strain of super-rabies. That bat is you, Ninja Bat! Seeking vengeance for the atrocities performed upon you, your goal is to kill as many humans as possible, and to spread the super-rabies virus in your stead.

This game has been designed to be played on a custom arcade machine. But we have included a PC build with a control layout image. We highly recommend having the control layout open whilst playing on PC.
